cleaned_text: Detox Zeolite is a mineral that has been used for decades to remove heavy metals from the body. It's a natural, non-toxic compound that works by binding to toxic metals and removing them from the body through your urine. Heavy metals are everywhere in our environment—they're in our water supply, they're in the soil we grow foods in, and they're even in the air we breathe. But when these toxins build up in our bodies over time, they can cause stress on our immune system and lead to serious health problems. That's why we created a zeolite supplement that helps you detox heavy metals from your body naturally so you don't have to worry about them anymore! We use high-quality ingredients in every single batch, so you can rest easy knowing that it's safe for you and your family.
